item.title: Principal Investigator
item.description: Yaping Liu (刘亚平) is an Assistant Professor (tenure-track) in Division of Human Genetics, Department of Pediatric at CCHMC and College of Medicine at University of Cincinnati (2019-). Prior to joining CCHMC and UC faculty, he was the principal computational biologist at Freenome Inc in 2018. In 2014-2017, he was a postdoc associate with Dr. Manolis Kellis in the Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory MIT and Broad institute. In 2014, He received his Ph.
